summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels
Review Date: 2020/07/30
Store: Monikahair
Average Rating: 2.9
Product Details: {'UPC': '739515020639'}
Review Text: I used the foot peel mask exactly two days ago. As you can see my feet are already peeling. My thumbs and pointer fingers began peeling yesterday because I used them to open up the socks to put my feet in. A pair of booties come attached so you have to carefully cut them apart and then cut them open before you can separate it to put on. You have to make sure there's a cotton like barrier on each side of the booties before you put your foot in. Hence my thumb and pointer fingers peeling. I must say that this peel mask is way more effective than the one I used twice from Walmart. This one works a lot faster than the ones I've used before. I also like the fact that you get two pairs of them and they even include a callus shaver tool. I love the smell of lavender when you open up the mask even before you put them on. There's a tab on the side of the booties to peel and fold over so that the they are securely on your feet. Pretty nice idea considering the last feet mask, I used you had to put socks on over them to make sure 1. I didn't fall while moving around and 2. they don't slip off. The tabs make sure they stay in place and I was able to walk in them with my house shoes on. I wore them for an hour and washed the solution off my feet which were very soft afterwards. I did notice that my feet were a little dry feeling after a while but still soft. This is going to be added to my pandemic self care routine....and probably post pandemic.
Review Title: Very effective
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin
Review Date: 2020/07/30
Store: Wonder4
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'}
Review Text: I used this for the heels of my feet and wasn't thoroughly impressed. You have to lightly place it on your feet for the roller to go over the area you want. Putting too much pressure will cause it to stop in place. There are three different  grinder heads from soft to rough, but I didn't feel as though one was more effective than the other. I do like how easy it was to switch form one grinder head to the other and the concept and idea of the grinder heads. It had to be charged for about an hour when I initially opened the box.
Review Title: It'll suffice
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Biutee Poly Nail Gel Kit 15ml 0.53oz Pink Nail Extension Gel Builder Gel Long Lasting Nail Salon Nail Art Design DIY at Home Beginner Friendly…
Review Date: 2020/09/21
Store: Biutee
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 2 x 1.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: I like this poly gel a little better than the one I've used previously. I will say I'm disappointed because according to the description/title this is supposed to be a kit. To me a kit comes with more than just one item. Well all I received was the poly gel. Aside from that, I love the color, although I could have used a little more on a few of my nails. The tube is rather small, but I still have enough left for at last two more manicures....I think. I ended up using gel polish over the poly gel but next time I think I will just wear it by itself. It took well to the polish and looks fabulous. It also has a nice shine/polish to it and it's very easy to file/shape.
Review Title: Such a nice color
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Glass spray bottle-16 ounce empty bottle ounce refillable container 2 packs, suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants with mist and air flow settings
Review Date: 2020/10/11
Store: DS DOODLE SABBATH
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'DS DOODLE SABBATH', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable Nozzle', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '619011520959'}
Review Text: I'm used to putting my hair oils in plastic bottles and notice that a lot of times they leak out, how I'm not exactly sure. I was a little concerned that if I put my hair oil in one of these glass spray bottles it may not spray like it should and I'd have to figure something else out or continue to have leaking plastic bottles. Little did I know that these would work and work well. I love the idea of the tiny funnel which helped make sure none of the oil spilled and went directly into the bottle. I like the little chalkboard like labels which I used on both bottles. I used to other bottle for my leave in moisturizing conditioner and it works like a charm. I have to be a little more careful with the bottles as they are glass and I'm not used to using glass spray bottles. The spray nozzle has the option to stop it from spraying and two ways it can spray, shower or stream. The bottles are very lightweight even after you add content inside of it. You can use either the spray nozzle or the cap to keep things sealed, options for your desired use. Love these.
Review Title: Love these glass spray bottles
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use
Review Date: 2020/10/25
Store: Keiby Citom
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'}
Review Text: I was able to use this emery  board on both my natural nails, poly gel, and acrylic nails when I wanted to shape or file them down. Very comfortable to hold and use. I was able to use one side for my natural nails (180) and the other side for the acrylic and poly gel nails (100). There are a lot in the pack so I'll be using them for a while without having to worry about running out of them. I like how the 100 side works really well to file/shape the acrylic/poly gel nails and the 180 side is gentle enough for my natural nails. Definitely a must have for your manicures.
Review Title: Nice sturdy emery board
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Spray Bottle with Adjustable Nozzle, Suream 10.6oz/300ml Green Mist Sprayer with Stream for Curly Hair, Refillable Empty Plastic Bottle for Hairdressing, Planting, Ironing and Cleaning
Review Date: 2020/10/31
Store: SUREAM
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 4.49 x 3.07 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '735632989217'}
Review Text: Used this spray bottle with water in it to iron clothes. Initially I thought it only had a stream and off option despite what the descriptions say, but if you turn the nozzle slightly from the off position, you'll be able to get a mist from the water bottle when you spray. I used this for ironing and if I were to use the bottle for cleaning, I'd use the stream option. Be careful not to turn the nozzle too much or else when you spray it, it will stream, but water will also sprinkle out from the bottle's nozzle and run down your finger(s). I like the size and shape of it as I can store it in the laundry room and not have to worry about it taking up too much space. The color of the bottle is nice also.
Review Title: Nice spray bottle
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Transparent Flexible Silicon Wig Grip Headband, 2Pcs Wig Bands for Making Wigs, Soft Drop-Shaped Wig Hair Bands Scarf, Elastic Grip Band For Wigs Running Sport Headband (Light Brown+Transparent)
Review Date: 2020/11/05
Store: YMSGIRL
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic,Silicon', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'YMSGIRL', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 3.46 x 1.1 inches; 1.76 Ounces'}
Review Text: I used this on an older wig and a newer one. It held both wigs in place fairly well. It wasn't too tight around my head and held everything together but I wouldn't want to wear it for extremely long periods of time. I didn't have to worry about my wig flying away because it was too windy outside. Moving my head around while it was on took a little adjusting to but after about 30 minutes I was fine and forgot I even had it on. What I really like about this is that I don't have to worry anymore about the back of my own hair getting clipped or stuck on the installed wig clips and elastic latch. I have this issues even with regular wig caps. The band prevents that from happening which is a plus for me because the latch can sit over the band.
Review Title: Nice hold
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl
Review Date: 2020/11/05
Store: lootaan
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'}
Review Text: These tips were so easy to apply, file, and shape. I love using them. I needed them to cover my nails so I can use the min dipping powder. They worked exceptionally well. I was able to file them down to look like my normal nails would and the powder was able to apply and bond to them well. I also tried gel nail polish over a few of them and the gel also bonded to the nails well. They felt really light and very flexible once I clipped and filed them. Pretty sure I can use these for a lot more versus the full cover nails. BTW that's my pointer finger not my middle finger in the single finger picture.
Review Title: Love it
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Whisper 90mL, a skin caressing floral Eau De Parfum for Women with calm base notes of Musk, delicate Fruity middle tones by perfume artisan Swiss Arabian
Review Date: 2020/11/15
Store: Swiss Arabian
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Swiss Arabian', 'Item Volume': '90 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Floral', 'Fragrance Concentration': 'Eau_de_parfum', 'Item Weight': '0.8 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.15 x 3.15 inches; 12.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '769471301275'}
Review Text: I'm not too big on perfumes but decided to try this one to see if it would be something I liked. It is! The scent is like a fruity musk scent but very light and lasts for some time. I tried it first on the inside of my elbow to make sure I didn't have any negative reactions to it and I got hooked from the first smell. I've gotten a few compliments about the smell being nice and others wanting to know what perfume I'm wearing. Be careful not to spray too much so it's not overwhelming and honestly you don't need to spray that much for it to last. I also like the bottle and the tassels around it. Very well designed bottle and in my favorite color so that was a plus. It was also packaged very well too. I can give my regular perfumes a break and use this one now since I've had no adverse reactions from it, it smells really nice, and get a lot of compliments about it.
Review Title: Very nice smell
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pine Gel Nail Polish Set 6 Colors Purple Blue Cat Eye Glitter Gel Polish 7.5 ml Soak Off UV LED Cure Home Salon Manicure
Review Date: 2020/11/27
Store: pine
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '9.524 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4.84 x 2.87 x 3.58 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.87 x 3.58 inches; 9.77 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890955'}
Review Text: These polishes are thick and only truly require one coat to cure and be done. I love that the colors are on the top of the bottles for you to know which one you're using. I forgot to use the magnet to get the cat eye effect but will try it later before curing the polish. I like the various shades of blues and purples in the set. Despite how thick it is, it only took one time to cure and dry which is a huge plus since you have to wait a while for a thick regular polish to dry.
Review Title: Thick polish but not too thick
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BEPHOLAN Natural Eyelash Growth Serum and Brow Enhancer to Grow Thicker, Longer Lashes for Long, Luscious Lashes and Eyebrows|15ML
Review Date: 2020/12/06
Store: BEPHOLAN
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.43 x 1.34 x 0.94 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: Such a great eyelash serum and I so love that it's in the form of an eyelash brush versus the thin brushes I've used in the past. I feel like using the eyelash brush is way better and applies more evenly than anything else and I'm able to get my lashes from the root to the end of the lash with the serum. Be careful though because I low key poked myself with the brush in both eyes once lol. I've noticed growth since using this eyelash serum and I've been using it for the past 2 weeks twice a day. I also like how I'm killing two birds with one stone by using the serum and also curling my lashes at the same time. I've used it with my contacts on and had not problems with the serum or brush.
Review Title: Love it, growth and curling at the same time.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series)
Review Date: 2020/12/08
Store: MIZHSE
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '478.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 4.88 x 1.42 inches; 12.8 Ounces'}
Review Text: I'm disappointed with this poly gel kit. I tried using the clear one first and had so much problems with trying to mold it into the nail former with slip solution. Then I tried the deep pink and didn't like how it came out. I did the light pink and it came out super nicely, but less than 24 hours later 9 out of 10 came off. Didn't do anything differently with my nail prep or the base coat I use so I'm confused and overly disappointed about how and why 9 of them came off my nails. The poly gels are thick and really easy to use. The kit comes in really pretty colors including 2 glitter poly gel. I just hate that it didn't last long.
Review Title: So disappointed
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beuaty Star 3PCS Poly Nail Gel Kit 30ml, Extension Gel Trial Kit Nail Enhancement Builder Gel Professional Nail Gel All-in One with with Base Top Coat
Review Date: 2020/12/26
Store: Beauty Star
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Beauty Star', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Unit Count': '144.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '10.7 x 9.2 x 1.7 inches; 1.15 Pounds'}
Review Text: This poly-gel was a little frustrating to work with. It comes out of the tube a little thick and the slip solution does little to even it out thinly. The base coat is fine but the top coat is super thick and you have to be careful not to put too much on your nail. The nail file works well as do the brush and gel tool. I have tried the nail art tool yet but I'm sure they work fine. The poly- gel also leaves a little residue on the edge of your fingers which I don't like. Even after cured with the top coat out still feels like it's not dried/cured all the way. It doesn't feel heavy on your nails though so that's a good thing and the colors are pretty (clear, white and pink).
Review Title: Doesn't feel dried/cured
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eyenjoy Poly Gel Nail Kit,Nail Builder Gel Extension Nail Gel Kit,6 Regular Color Nail Extension Slip Solution Professional Kit for DIY Mother Girl Gift
Review Date: 2020/12/26
Store: Eyenjoy
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Included Components': 'Nail Brush, Nail File', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '11.81 x 7.87 x 1.77 inches; 1.5 Pounds', 'UPC': '712491595162'}
Review Text: This poly-gel kit was so easy to use and apply. It comes with everything you need and is easy to mold onto your mail or with the nail mold. The slip solution works well. The base and top coats are a nice consistency to where you can build on them. It cures really quickly and has a nice gloss to it from the top coat. I tried to blend the two pinks and it didn't turn out exactly as I planned but that's okay.
Review Title: Simple kit with pretty colors
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MERISIHAIR Short Bob Wig with Bangs,Straight Black Bob Wigs for Women,Natural Short Synthetic Bob Wig 11inch(Black)
Review Date: 2021/06/16
Store: MERISIHAIR
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'MERISIHAIR', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.54 x 8.23 x 2.17 inches; 8.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '780744482828'}
Review Text: I don't know why I even tried with this wig. The part is nice but....yeah....too white to look like a my hair part color. If I move it away from my head the bangs look weird. It was extra silky feeling and just felt wiggy. Looked like it was made decently except for the part color. Didn't frizz or shed much but just not for me.
Review Title: Cute but not worth it
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

My thumbs and pointer fingers began peeling yesterday because I used them to open up the socks to put my feet in. A pair of booties come attached so you have to carefully cut them apart and then cut them open before you can separate it to put on. You have to make sure there's a cotton like barrier on each side of the booties before you put your foot in. Hence my thumb and pointer fingers peeling. I must say that this peel mask is way more effective than the one I used twice from Walmart. This one works a lot faster than the ones I've used before. I also like the fact that you get two pairs of them and they even include a callus shaver tool. I love the smell of lavender when you open up the mask even before you put them on. There's a tab on the side of the booties to peel and fold over so that the they are securely on your feet. The tabs make sure they stay in place and I was able to walk in them with my house shoes on. I wore them for an hour and washed the solution off my feet which were very soft afterwards. I did notice that my feet were a little dry feeling after a while but still soft. This is going to be added to my pandemic self care routine....and probably post pandemic.
Very effective

Despite how thick it is, it only took one time to cure and dry which is a huge plus since you have to wait a while for a thick regular polish to dry.
Thick polish but not too thick
BEPHOLAN Natural Eyelash Growth Serum and Brow Enhancer to Grow Thicker, Longer Lashes for Long, Luscious Lashes and Eyebrows|15ML
BEPHOLAN
{'Package Dimensions': '5.43 x 1.34 x 0.94 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Such a great eyelash serum and I so love that it's in the form of an eyelash brush versus the thin brushes I've used in the past. I feel like using the eyelash brush is way better and applies more evenly than anything else and I'm able to get my lashes from the root to the end of the lash with the serum. Be careful though because I low key poked myself with the brush in both eyes once lol. I've noticed growth since using this eyelash serum and I've been using it for the past 2 weeks twice a day. I also like how I'm killing two birds with one stone by using the serum and also curling my lashes at the same time. I've used it with my contacts on and had not problems with the serum or brush.
Love it, growth and curling at the same time.
Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series)
MIZHSE
{'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '478.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 4.88 x 1.42 inches; 12.8 Ounces'}
I'm disappointed with this poly gel kit. I tried using the clear one first and had so much problems with trying to mold it into the nail former with slip solution. Then I tried the deep pink and didn't like how it came out. I did the light pink and it came out super nicely, but less than 24 hours later 9 out of 10 came off. Didn't do anything differently with my nail prep or the base coat I use so I'm confused and overly disappointed about how and why 9 of them came off my nails. The poly gels are thick and really easy to use. The kit comes in really pretty colors including 2 glitter poly gel. I just hate that it didn't last long.
So disappointed
Beuaty Star 3PCS Poly Nail Gel Kit 30ml, Extension Gel Trial Kit Nail Enhancement Builder Gel Professional Nail Gel All-in One with with Base Top Coat
Beauty Star
{'Brand': 'Beauty Star', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Unit Count': '144.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '10.7 x 9.2 x 1.7 inches; 1.15 Pounds'}
This poly-gel was a little frustrating to work with. It comes out of the tube a little thick and the slip solution does little to even it out thinly. The base coat is fine but the top coat is super thick and you have to be careful not to put too much on your nail. The nail file works well as do the brush and gel tool. I have tried the nail art tool yet but I'm sure they work fine. The poly- gel also leaves a little residue on the edge of your fingers which I don't like. Even after cured with the top coat out still feels like it's not dried/cured all the way. It doesn't feel heavy on your nails though so that's a good thing and the colors are pretty (clear, white and pink).
Doesn't feel dried/cured
Eyenjoy Poly Gel Nail Kit,Nail Builder Gel Extension Nail Gel Kit,6 Regular Color Nail Extension Slip Solution Professional Kit for DIY Mother Girl Gift
Eyenjoy
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Included Components': 'Nail Brush, Nail File', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '11.81 x 7.87 x 1.77 inches; 1.5 Pounds', 'UPC': '712491595162'}
This poly-gel kit was so easy to use and apply. It comes with everything you need and is easy to mold onto your mail or with the nail mold. The slip solution works well. The base and top coats are a nice consistency to where you can build on them. It cures really quickly and has a nice gloss to it from the top coat. I tried to blend the two pinks and it didn't turn out exactly as I planned but that's okay.
Simple kit with pretty colors
MERISIHAIR Short Bob Wig with Bangs,Straight Black Bob Wigs for Women,Natural Short Synthetic Bob Wig 11inch(Black)
MERISIHAIR
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'MERISIHAIR', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.54 x 8.23 x 2.17 inches; 8.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '780744482828'}
I don't know why I even tried with this wig. The part is nice but....yeah....too white to look like a my hair part color. If I move it away from my head the bangs look weird. It was extra silky feeling and just felt wiggy. Looked like it was made decently except for the part color. Didn't frizz or shed much but just not for me.
Cute but not worth it
prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

    Here's the purchase data:

    === Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels
Review Date: 2020/07/30
Store: Monikahair
Average Rating: 2.9
Product Details: {'UPC': '739515020639'}
Review Text: I used the foot peel mask exactly two days ago. As you can see my feet are already peeling. My thumbs and pointer fingers began peeling yesterday because I used them to open up the socks to put my feet in. A pair of booties come attached so you have to carefully cut them apart and then cut them open before you can separate it to put on. You have to make sure there's a cotton like barrier on each side of the booties before you put your foot in. Hence my thumb and pointer fingers peeling. I must say that this peel mask is way more effective than the one I used twice from Walmart. This one works a lot faster than the ones I've used before. I also like the fact that you get two pairs of them and they even include a callus shaver tool. I love the smell of lavender when you open up the mask even before you put them on. There's a tab on the side of the booties to peel and fold over so that the they are securely on your feet. Pretty nice idea considering the last feet mask, I used you had to put socks on over them to make sure 1. I didn't fall while moving around and 2. they don't slip off. The tabs make sure they stay in place and I was able to walk in them with my house shoes on. I wore them for an hour and washed the solution off my feet which were very soft afterwards. I did notice that my feet were a little dry feeling after a while but still soft. This is going to be added to my pandemic self care routine....and probably post pandemic.
Review Title: Very effective
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin
Review Date: 2020/07/30
Store: Wonder4
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'}
Review Text: I used this for the heels of my feet and wasn't thoroughly impressed. You have to lightly place it on your feet for the roller to go over the area you want. Putting too much pressure will cause it to stop in place. There are three different  grinder heads from soft to rough, but I didn't feel as though one was more effective than the other. I do like how easy it was to switch form one grinder head to the other and the concept and idea of the grinder heads. It had to be charged for about an hour when I initially opened the box.
Review Title: It'll suffice
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Biutee Poly Nail Gel Kit 15ml 0.53oz Pink Nail Extension Gel Builder Gel Long Lasting Nail Salon Nail Art Design DIY at Home Beginner Friendly…
Review Date: 2020/09/21
Store: Biutee
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 2 x 1.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: I like this poly gel a little better than the one I've used previously. I will say I'm disappointed because according to the description/title this is supposed to be a kit. To me a kit comes with more than just one item. Well all I received was the poly gel. Aside from that, I love the color, although I could have used a little more on a few of my nails. The tube is rather small, but I still have enough left for at last two more manicures....I think. I ended up using gel polish over the poly gel but next time I think I will just wear it by itself. It took well to the polish and looks fabulous. It also has a nice shine/polish to it and it's very easy to file/shape.
Review Title: Such a nice color
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Glass spray bottle-16 ounce empty bottle ounce refillable container 2 packs, suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants with mist and air flow settings
Review Date: 2020/10/11
Store: DS DOODLE SABBATH
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'DS DOODLE SABBATH', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable Nozzle', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '619011520959'}
Review Text: I'm used to putting my hair oils in plastic bottles and notice that a lot of times they leak out, how I'm not exactly sure. I was a little concerned that if I put my hair oil in one of these glass spray bottles it may not spray like it should and I'd have to figure something else out or continue to have leaking plastic bottles. Little did I know that these would work and work well. I love the idea of the tiny funnel which helped make sure none of the oil spilled and went directly into the bottle. I like the little chalkboard like labels which I used on both bottles. I used to other bottle for my leave in moisturizing conditioner and it works like a charm. I have to be a little more careful with the bottles as they are glass and I'm not used to using glass spray bottles. The spray nozzle has the option to stop it from spraying and two ways it can spray, shower or stream. The bottles are very lightweight even after you add content inside of it. You can use either the spray nozzle or the cap to keep things sealed, options for your desired use. Love these.
Review Title: Love these glass spray bottles
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===

Review Text: I was able to use this emery  board on both my natural nails, poly gel, and acrylic nails when I wanted to shape or file them down. Very comfortable to hold and use. I was able to use one side for my natural nails (180) and the other side for the acrylic and poly gel nails (100). There are a lot in the pack so I'll be using them for a while without having to worry about running out of them. I like how the 100 side works really well to file/shape the acrylic/poly gel nails and the 180 side is gentle enough for my natural nails. Definitely a must have for your manicures.

Initially I thought it only had a stream and off option despite what the descriptions say, but if you turn the nozzle slightly from the off position, you'll be able to get a mist from the water bottle when you spray. I used this for ironing and if I were to use the bottle for cleaning, I'd use the stream option. Be careful not to turn the nozzle too much or else when you spray it, it will stream, but water will also sprinkle out from the bottle's nozzle and run down your finger(s). I like the size and shape of it as I can store it in the laundry room and not have to worry about it taking up too much space. The color of the bottle is nice also.

Review Text: I used this on an older wig and a newer one. It held both wigs in place fairly well. It wasn't too tight around my head and held everything together but I wouldn't want to wear it for extremely long periods of time. I didn't have to worry about my wig flying away because it was too windy outside. Moving my head around while it was on took a little adjusting to but after about 30 minutes I was fine and forgot I even had it on. What I really like about this is that I don't have to worry anymore about the back of my own hair getting clipped or stuck on the installed wig clips and elastic latch. I have this issues even with regular wig caps. The band prevents that from happening which is a plus for me because the latch can sit over the band.

    Structure your response as:
   
    SUMMARY:
    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual's purchasing behavior reveals a strong preference for self-care and beauty products, particularly focused on foot care, nail enhancements, and hair accessories. They tend to favor items that are functional, easy to use, and effective, often expressing satisfaction with products that are innovative or address specific needs. 

Consistent high ratings accompanied by positive reviews suggest a fondness for quality over quantity, notably in items like foot masks and spray bottles, which enhance their beauty routine. There is a clear pattern of exploring various nail products, with a mix of positive and negative experiences, indicating a willingness to experiment but with some price sensitivity evident in their disappointment when products do not meet expectations.

Price-sensitive trends are noticeable in the recurring themes, as the individual appears to favor products that offer good value for money, particularly in nail supplies that allow for multiple applications. Additionally, the review texts highlight a desire for practical solutions, such as tools that enhance efficiency and ease of use, with an appreciation for thoughtful design elements.

Overall, the core preferences center around enhancing personal aesthetics with an emphasis on effectiveness, ease of use, and innovative designs, balanced by a keen awareness of quality and value.

target_interaction.title: Easy to replace and use
target_interaction.text: Easily replaceable and simple to use. Conserves the blade in your shaver really well and keeps out moisture. Really like using this.
target_interaction.title_meta: Sorbient Cartridge for BLADELIFE Razor Holder and Travel Case, Extracts Moisture to Keep Blade Dry and Sharp, Doubles Blade Life- 2 PACK
features: USE WITH BLADELIFE RAZOR STORAGE HOLDER: A cartridge with Sorbient Technology is used together with BLADELIFE razor protector holder to help your blade stay dry and bacteria free.

INCREASE BLADE LIFE UP TO 2X LONGER: As the Sorbient technology cartridge extracts excess moisture in the razor holder, you no longer have to wipe your blade on a towel to dry it, an action that may remove the protective coating on the blade over time and affect its glide and ultimately your shaving comfort.

SAVE MONEY ON RAZOR BLADES: Since the cartridge helps dry your razor blade in between shaves and prolongs its service lifespan, this means savings for you since you don't have to refill regularly or use disposable blades as frequently as you did.
RECOMMENDED CARTRIDGE REPLACEMENT: It's recommended that you replace the Sorbient Technology cartridge every 3 months to ensure optimal moisture absorption and razor blade protection.
EASY TO INSTALL: Insert the cartridge into the BLADELIFE storage case, press firmly to secure before twisting to lock.

videos.title: Instructions for use of the product
Watch Before You Buy These Must-Have Travel Favorites
